column4: i have downloaded cedega demo,now i want to know how to install it?
i really need hel witg this
Usually we look at the filename.
If there's no extension it's usually a text file, or a script.
In this case it's a script or binary.
You can probably double click on it, but if that doesn't do anything...
open up Terminal (from the accessories menu)
If you downloaded it into your home directory, you should be able to type "./cedega_timedemo_installer"
It should either run, or give you an error message.
Try "sh cedega_timedemo_installer"; fi that doesn't work, check the web page jos mentioned.
That error means it can't find a file.
That's in the repositories. Do you know how to use Synaptic Package Manager?
My mistake, it doesn't have a dash; look for libgtk1.2
When synaptic's done, try running the installer again.
